data.text: I have a runny nose and sneezing.
I got a paper cut on my finger.
I have a mild stomachache after eating too quickly.
I bumped my knee against a table, and it's bruised.
I have a deep splinter in my hand that's causing pain.
I fell while hiking and twisted my ankle; it's swollen.
I have a persistent high fever, chills, and body aches.
I have a minor headache from staying up late.
I accidentally touched a hot stove, and my finger is burned.
I have a mild cough and sore throat.
I have a mosquito bite that's itchy and swollen.
I have a deep cut on my hand from a kitchen knife.
